BiocPkgStatus 0.0.0

BiocPkgStatus: longitudinal database of package check outcomes

Vincent J. Carey, stvjc at channing.harvard.edu

November 11, 2022

Source: vignettes/BiocPkgStatus.Rmd
BiocPkgStatus.Rmd

Introduction

The BiocBuildTools package (github: vjcitn/BiocBuildTools) has prototypical code for checking all packages and storing results in SQLite.

To get a version of the database, point a browser to https://tinyurl.com/3hbvaejj and download the SQLite file found there.

Set environment variable BIOC_PKG_STATUS_SQLITE to the path where the SQLite file was stored.

Basic queries

We work with the database as follows:

library(BiocPkgStatus)
con = status_db()
con |> dbListTables()
## [1] "BcChkERR"  "BcChkWARN" "basic"     "desc"      "errors"    "inst"     
## [7] "notes"     "warnings"

The basic table has a listing of package commit and check times.

con |> tbl("basic") |> head(10)
## # Source:   SQL [10 x 4]
## # Database: sqlite 3.39.4 [/home/stvjc/bioclongit.sqlite]
##    package     version date_commit date_check
##    <chr>       <chr>   <chr>       <chr>     
##  1 a4Base      1.47.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  2 a4Classif   1.47.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  3 a4Core      1.47.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  4 a4Preproc   1.47.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  5 a4Reporting 1.47.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  6 ABarray     1.67.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  7 abseqR      1.17.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  8 ABSSeq      1.53.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
##  9 acde        1.29.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-09
## 10 ACE         1.17.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-07
con |> tbl("basic") |> filter(package=="parody")
## # Source:   SQL [2 x 4]
## # Database: sqlite 3.39.4 [/home/stvjc/bioclongit.sqlite]
##   package version date_commit date_check
##   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>       <chr>     
## 1 parody  1.57.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-07
## 2 parody  1.57.0  2022-11-01  2022-11-10

Tables error, warnings and notes are from rcmdcheck::rcmdcheck applied with no additional parameters. desc contains data from DESCRIPTION for each package at time of check. BcChkERR and BcChkWARN are from BiocCheck::BiocCheck.

con |> tbl("BcChkERR") |> filter(type=="checkVigInstalls")
## # Source:   SQL [?? x 3]
## # Database: sqlite 3.39.4 [/home/stvjc/bioclongit.sqlite]
##    package           type             message                                   
##    <chr>             <chr>            <chr>                                     
##  1 AnVILPublish      checkVigInstalls * ERROR: Installation calls found in vign…
##  2 AnVILPublish      checkVigInstalls Found in files:                           
##  3 AnVILPublish      checkVigInstalls vignettes/AnVILPublishIntro.Rmd (code lin…
##  4 AUCell            checkVigInstalls * ERROR: Installation calls found in vign…
##  5 AUCell            checkVigInstalls Found in files:                           
##  6 AUCell            checkVigInstalls vignettes/AUCell.Rmd (code line 84, colum…
##  7 BiocDockerManager checkVigInstalls * ERROR: Installation calls found in vign…
##  8 BiocDockerManager checkVigInstalls Found in files:                           
##  9 BiocDockerManager checkVigInstalls vignettes/BiocDockerManager.Rmd (code lin…
## 10 BiocDockerManager checkVigInstalls vignettes/BiocDockerManager.Rmd (code lin…
## # … with more rows
RSQLite::dbDisconnect(con)
